TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ContextOptions extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定繫結至伺服器時使用的選項。

span.span: Specifies the options that are used for binding to the server.

summary.span: 應用程式可以設定以位元 OR 運算連結的多個選項。

span.span: The application can set multiple options that are linked with a bitwise OR operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未指定的內容選項的應用程式，帳戶管理 API 會使用下列選項的組合：When the context options are not specified by the application, the Account Management API uses the following combination of options: - ContextOptions.Negotiate | ContextOptions.Signing | ContextOptions.SealingContextOptions.Negotiate | ContextOptions.Signing | ContextOptions.Sealing

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions Negotiate = int32(1)

summary.span: 用戶端是使用 Kerberos 或 NTLM 進行驗證。

span.span: The client is authenticated by using either Kerberos or NTLM.

summary.span: 未提供使用者名稱和密碼時，帳戶管理 API 會使用發出呼叫之執行緒的安全性內容來繫結至物件，這個安全性內容可能是應用程式在其下執行之使用者帳戶的安全性內容，也可能是發出呼叫的執行緒所代表之用戶端使用者帳戶的安全性內容。

span.span: When the user name and password are not provided, the Account Management API binds to the object by using the security context of the calling thread, which is either the security context of the user account under which the application is running or of the client user account that the calling thread represents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions Sealing = int32(16)

summary.span: 資料是使用 Kerberos 加密。

span.span: The data is encrypted by using Kerberos.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個旗標只能與 Negotiate 內容選項一起使用，不適用於簡單繫結選項。This flag can only be used with the Negotiate context option and is not available with the simple bind option.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions SecureSocketLayer = int32(4)

summary.span: 通道是使用 Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) 加密。

span.span: The channel is encrypted by using the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL).

summary.span: Active Directory 需要安裝憑證服務才能支援 SSL。

span.span: Active Directory requires that the Certificate Services be installed to support SSL.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions ServerBind = int32(32)

summary.span: 如果應用程式要繫結至特定伺服器名稱，請在使用網域內容型別時指定這個旗標。

span.span: Specify this flag when you use the domain context type if the application is binding to a specific server name.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions Signing = int32(8)

span.span: The integrity of the data is verified.

summary.span: 這個旗標只能與 Negotiate 內容選項一起使用，不適用於簡單繫結選項。

span.span: This flag can only be used with the Negotiate context option and is not available with the simple bind option.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextOptions SimpleBind = int32(2)

summary.span: 用戶端是使用基本驗證進行驗證。

span.span: The client is authenticated by using the Basic authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks **注意：** 通訊可能會在網際網路上以純文字傳送如果 SecureSocketsLayer 選項不利用簡單繫結指定。**Caution** Communications may be sent over the Internet in clear text if the SecureSocketsLayer option is not specified with simple bind.
